TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from culinary experts who love using our app to build delicious foods.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my meal prep! The easy-to-use tools and vast ingredient database make building creative dishes a breeze.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a busy mom, I love how this app lets me quickly plan out nutritious family meals for the week. It's a lifesaver!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether I'm developing recipes for my blog or just cooking for myself, this app has become an essential tool in my kitchen.
FAQ_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Frequently Asked Questions about Building Foods
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common queries about our food construction app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What types of foods can I build?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to virtually construct dishes from a wide range of ingredients. Build everything from simple snacks to elaborate gourmet meals.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: No special equipment is required, just your mobile device or computer. The app uses an intuitive drag-and-drop interface to piece together foods.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I share my food creations?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, you can easily share photos and recipes for the virtual foods you've built with friends through social media or email.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is there a tutorial or guide?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: The app includes a quick tutorial to get you started as well as tips for advanced food building techniques.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is this app for professional chefs?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: While professionals may enjoy the creative outlet, this app is designed for anyone to have fun virtually constructing all kinds of foods.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Discover recipes, plan meals, and build your culinary skills.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: New! Build your culinary creations with ease.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Our app streamlines the process of creating mouthwatering recipes, from ingredient selection to final plating. Unleash your culinary creativity!
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_FOOTER_TEXT_1: Learn how to craft delicious dishes
FOOTER_COMPONENT_2_BODY_TEXT_3: Pantry staples to have on hand
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Craft your culinary creations with ease using FoodBuilder. Our innovative app lets you design and visualize recipes, plan meals, and discover new flavor combinations. Built for food lovers by food lovers.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Create and personalize recipes to suit your taste preferences and dietary needs. Mix and match ingredients for endless culinary possibilities.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Streamline your meal prep with smart planning tools. Generate grocery lists, schedule meals, and stay organized with ease.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Get detailed nutritional breakdowns for your recipes and meal plans. Track macros, calories, and make informed choices for a balanced diet.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Short on an ingredient? Our app suggests suitable replacements based on flavor profiles and dietary restrictions.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Connect with a community of food enthusiasts. Share your creations, discover new recipes, and get inspired by others.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Generate optimized shopping lists based on your meal plans and pantry inventory. Save time and reduce food waste.
CTA_BODY: Our app streamlines the process of meal planning, shopping, and cooking. Say goodbye to recipe books and endless searching - we've got you covered for creating mouthwatering dishes with ease.
HERO_SUBTITLE: An intuitive app for crafting mouthwatering meals
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Design, share, and bring your food ideas to life.
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in Touch with Our Food App Experts
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let's discuss how we can help bring your culinary vision to life
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: A colorful assortment of nutrient-rich veggies from local farmers.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Fresh eggs laid by happy, free-range hens on partner farms.

PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Creamy milk, yogurt, and cheeses sourced from ethical local dairies.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Food Building App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is a food building app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app allows you to virtually construct meals by combining different ingredients. Think of it like digital Lego bricks, but for creating tasty dishes!
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Simply select ingredients from our library and drag-and-drop them to build your virtual dish. You can get creative by trying new flavor combinations.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What kind of ingredients are available?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We have a vast collection of ingredients from cuisines around the world. From common items like bread and cheese to more unique options like exotic spices and superfoods.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I share my food creations?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! Our app lets you share the dishes you designed with friends or the entire community. You can get feedback, swap recipes, and find inspiration.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Explore a vast collection of recipes from around the world, with step-by-step instructions and mouth-watering photos to inspire your culinary journey.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Personalize your meal planning experience by creating custom meal plans tailored to your dietary preferences, schedule, and taste buds.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Automatically generate shopping lists based on your selected recipes, making grocery shopping a breeze and reducing food waste.
